00036 #include "FarhadifarTypeModifier.hpp"
00037 
00038 template<unsigned DIM>
00039 FarhadifarTypeModifier<DIM>::FarhadifarTypeModifier()
00040     : AbstractTargetAreaModifier<DIM>()
00041 {
00042 }
00043 
00044 template<unsigned DIM>
00045 FarhadifarTypeModifier<DIM>::~FarhadifarTypeModifier()
00046 {
00047 }
00048 
00049 template<unsigned DIM>
00050 void FarhadifarTypeModifier<DIM>::UpdateTargetAreaOfCell(CellPtr pCell)
00051 {
00052     // Get target area A of a healthy cell in S, G2 or M phase
00053     double cell_target_area = this->mReferenceTargetArea;
00054 
00055     if (pCell->HasCellProperty<ApoptoticCellProperty>())
00056     {
00057         // The target area of an apoptotic cell decreases linearly to zero (and past it negative)
00059         cell_target_area = cell_target_area - 0.5*cell_target_area/(pCell->GetApoptosisTime())*(SimulationTime::Instance()->GetTime()-pCell->GetStartOfApoptosisTime());
00060 
00061         // Don't allow a negative target area
00062         if (cell_target_area < 0)
00063         {
00064             cell_target_area = 0;
00065         }
00066     }
00067     else
00068     {
00069         double cell_age = pCell->GetAge();
00070 
00071         // Get the combined duration of the cell's M, G1 and S phases
00072         AbstractCellCycleModel* p_model = pCell->GetCellCycleModel();
00073         double growth_start_time = p_model->GetMDuration() + p_model->GetG1Duration() + p_model->GetSDuration();
00074 
00075         // The target area of a proliferating cell increases linearly from A to 2A over the course of the G2 phase
00076         if (cell_age > growth_start_time)
00077         {
00078             double g2_duration = p_model->GetG2Duration();
00079             cell_target_area *= (1 + (cell_age-growth_start_time)/g2_duration);
00080         }
00081 
00089         if (pCell->ReadyToDivide())
00090         {
00091             cell_target_area = this->mReferenceTargetArea;
00092         }
00093     }
00094 
00095     // Set cell data
00096     pCell->GetCellData()->SetItem("target area", cell_target_area);
00097 }
00098 
00099 // Explicit instantiation
00100 template class FarhadifarTypeModifier<1>;
00101 template class FarhadifarTypeModifier<2>;
00102 template class FarhadifarTypeModifier<3>;
